Hexo Heroku Auto Publisher

Pull github issues to Hexo as posts automatically on Heroku. This plugin can transform Hexo project to a Heroku app.

Hexo Migrator Issue

Pull the issues from a public Github repository into Hexo _posts folder as Markdown files.
